attributes.action: Create a Law that upholds the Spirit of any  Law passed by Parliament to be sacrosanct and cannot be impugned by any technical weakness found in the wording of the said Law.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: The purpose of this Law is to enable the Laws of the United Kingdom to serve the purpose for which they were passed by Parliament; enabling the due process of the Law to proceed without a prosecution being avoided by a technicality in the wording of the Law.

reasons: Wording that needs to be amended, or is impossible to understand
